full_summary:
### Tender Title: Open Construction Source List for CFB Suffield
### Tender Reference: MX-22640271613

**Overview**
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites contractors and suppliers to apply for the open construction source list for CFB Suffield. The list will be used for commercial, residential, industrial, institutional, and civil work with an estimated value of $10 million or less.

**Eligibility Criteria**

* Interested contractors and suppliers must submit a request through the MERX posting and indicate their preferred official language (English or French).
* DCC will require ten (10) business days to process an application.

**Selection Criteria**

* Contractors will be selected based on their submission information and shall meet the stated requirements.

**Contract Terms and Conditions**

* Contracts awarded by DCC will include measurable performance standards and requirements as detailed in the form DCL81-Performance Evaluation Guidelines.
* Contractors who receive an unacceptable or failing score may be removed from the source list.
* Tenders and contracts are subject to DCC's Procurement Code of Conduct.

**Security Requirements**

* Organization and personnel security requirements may be applicable for some contracts.
* Contractors must actively hold all required security clearance(s) at the time of closing.

**Language and Communication**

* The language selected by the applicant for this source list will be the only language used for the tender documents, contract documents, and communication for all future tenders and during the execution of any resulting contract.

**Application Process**

* Interested contractors and suppliers must submit their application through the MERX posting.
* Applications must be in the form of an electronic submission.

**Key Dates**

* The tender will close electronically through MERX on March 31, 2026 at 6:00 PM Eastern Time.
* The expected contract start date and end date are not specified.

**Contact Information**

* Justin Bennett
* Email: Justin.Bennett@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-962-2917

**Additional Resources**

* Defence Construction Canada website: https://www.cdc-dcc.gc.ca/
* MERX website: https://www.merx.com/ 

Note that the rewritten entry omits some information, such as the unauthorized copied text and mutual translation between English and French, concerned government websites, addresses of supporting information etc. to keep within the 400-word trigger. All relevant information necessary for understanding the text is included to ensure it remains transuluating relevancy.  Please feedback any issues, if you encountered during editing.
